title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.2 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.2 - General

State Regulations
(a) Notice. These
regulations set forth the information which must be provided whenever the
department imposes a sanction or requires repayment of overpayments or payment
of restitution. (b) Timing. These
regulations set forth the time periods within which to request a hearing and
the time periods within which hearings are to be scheduled and decisions
issued. (c) Procedures. These
regulations set forth what must be done to have a determination reviewed, including how to request another hearing date and how to obtain an interpreter
if the person does not speak English or is deaf. These regulations also explain
who may come to a hearing. (d) Information. These regulations set forth what information and documents are to
be provided to persons who have requested a hearing. (e) Decision. These regulations set forth
what to do if the department refuses to comply with the hearing
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
